column6: ------ March 13 (Xinhua) – The Ministry of Public Works and Transport on March 13
column7: 2020 has issued a letter ordering the suspension of entry for passenger or tourist vessels to Cambodia due to the need to prevent the spread of COVID-19.------The letter
column9: says that the General Department of Waterways
column10: Maritime and Ports decided to postpone approval of the passenger ships and tourists on board them coming into the country from today until a new decision is made.
